SEARCH
Package ms.logic

Class Game

java.lang.Object
ms.logic.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents a Minesweeper game instance. It manages the game state, including the minefield, game status, and statistics. It provides methods to reveal cells, flag cells, and reset the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(GridDimension dimensions, int totalMines, MineFieldFactory mineFieldFactory)
      Constructs a new Game instance with specified dimensions, total mines, and a mine field factory.
      Parameters:
      dimensions - the dimensions of the game grid
      totalMines - the total number of mines in the game
      mineFieldFactory - the factory to create mine fields

    • Game

      public Game(Difficulty difficulty)
      Constructs a new Game instance with specified difficulty. The dimensions and total mines are derived from the difficulty level.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - the difficulty level of the game

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over (either won or lost).
      Returns:

      public long getElapsedTime()
      Gets the elapsed time since the game started.
      Returns:
      the elapsed time in milliseconds

    • revealCell

      public void revealCell(Position position)
      Reveals a cell at the specified position. If this is the first reveal, it initializes the minefield and starts the timer.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the cell to reveal
      Throws:
      Game.InvalidGameOperationException - if the game is already over or if the position is invalid

    • flagCell

      public void flagCell(Position position)
      Flags or unflags a cell at the specified position. If this is the first reveal, it throws an exception since flagging is not allowed.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the cell to flag
      Throws:
      Game.InvalidGameOperationException - if the game is already over, if the position is invalid, or if flagging is attempted on the first move

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Resets the game to its initial state. Reinitializes the minefield, resets statistics, status manager, and timer.
